Name: Whoop It Up
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Honey, ginger, warm spices and lemon juice. A chilled winter warmer.
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly at The Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Whoop It Up contains 222 calories
